roleset.name: emit light randomly
roleset.note: FLICKER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flicker' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 43.1, no other framed members. Framenet class Light Emission. No comparison. (from flicker.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pretty simple, really
example.text: Lights flickered on and off; plaster dropped from the ceiling, the walls still shook and an evacuation alarm blared outside.
